byline.original: By OTTO D. TOLISCHUS Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Baltic States: Swedish reaction to situation; USSR-Lithuania conf results awaited
snippet: STOCKHOLM, July 2--Voicing the opinion of authoritative Swedish quarters the Svenska Dagbladet today issued an appeal for a compromise peace between Germany and Britain and urged that a mediator step forward to initiate negotiations to that end....

headline.main: FRANCO MEDIATION SEEN IN STOCKHOLM; Sweden Hopes a Negotiated Peace Will Avert Danger of German-Russian War Franco Believed Negotiating FRANCO MEDIATION SEEN IN STOCKHOLM Sweden and Reich Now Close

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, July 2--Voicing the opinion of authoritative Swedish quarters the Svenska Dagbladet today issued an appeal for a compromise peace between Germany and Britain and urged that a mediator step forward to initiate negotiations to that end.
